lead_paragraph: The authorities arrested 17 students in a sweeping drug sting at Texas Christian, including four members of the football team accused of selling marijuana to undercover officers.
snippet: The authorities arrested 17 students in a sweeping drug sting at Texas Christian, including four members of the football team accused of selling marijuana to undercover officers.
